channel.title: News on AMRcloud
channel.description: Recent content in News on AMRcloud

item.title: Registration
item.description:
Currently registration in AMRcloud is allowed after a personal request to support@antibiotic.ru only.

Please, specify your name, occupation, speciality, and organization you represent (if any) in your request letter.

The administration of AMRcloud will consider your application and will respond to you soon.
